languages.text: Адептус Администратум втянул колонию в утомительную процедуру оценки, завершение которой продолжает откладываться...
The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.
languages.original_text: Адептус Администратум втянул колонию в утомительную процедуру оценки, завершение которой продолжает откладываться...

traits.locale_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.
The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.
The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

languages.text: L'Adeptus Administratum a embourbé la colonie dans un processus d'approbation abrutissant dont on ne voit toujours pas le bout.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

traits.locale_text: L'Adeptus Administratum a embourbé la colonie dans un processus d'approbation abrutissant dont on ne voit toujours pas le bout.

languages.text: 帝国行政局はコロニーを気の遠くなるような評価手続きを押し付け、完了が何度も延期されている。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

traits.locale_text: 帝国行政局はコロニーを気の遠くなるような評価手続きを押し付け、完了が何度も延期されている。

languages.text: 帝国内政部正在对殖民地进行一项格外冗长的评估，评估的结束日期一拖再拖。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

traits.locale_text: 帝国内政部正在对殖民地进行一项格外冗长的评估，评估的结束日期一拖再拖。

languages.text: El Adeptus Administratum tiene enmarañada a la colonia en un proceso de tasación cuyo progreso se retrasa una y otra vez.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

traits.locale_text: El Adeptus Administratum tiene enmarañada a la colonia en un proceso de tasación cuyo progreso se retrasa una y otra vez.

languages.text: Das Adeptus Administratum hat die Kolonie in einen lähmenden Beurteilungsprozess gestürzt, dessen Abschluss immer wieder verzögert wird.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.

traits.locale_text: Das Adeptus Administratum hat die Kolonie in einen lähmenden Beurteilungsprozess gestürzt, dessen Abschluss immer wieder verzögert wird.

languages.text: Adeptus Administratum, koloniyi akılalmaz bir değerlendirme sürecine sapladı. Sürecin tamamlanması sürekli erteleniyor.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum has mired the colony in a mind-numbing appraisal process, the completion of which continues to be delayed.
